Uses of SimpleLoggerFA in org.apache.log4j
 

Fields in org.apache.log4j declared as SimpleLoggerFA
static SimpleLoggerFA LogManager.SIMPLE_LOGGER_FA
          Log4j components resort to this instance of SimpleLoggerFA in case an appropriate LoggerRepository was not set or could not be found.
